ResearchProjectDef.label: Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn basic elements of survival on this harsh planet. Unlocks Grill, Fueled stove and some beds for your colonists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: A gateway tech into learning how to generate Electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to refine and make some useful stuff. Allows your colonists to understand the various uses of weed and tobacco, such as rolling special cigarettes, making hemp and various medicinal uses. \n\nAlso unlocks the candy making table to make sweet treats and Ammo Bench to create some ammo for your guns and turrets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to refine and make some useful stuff with power of electricity. Allows your colonists to create a complex coffee machine, which turns coffee beans into hot fragrant drink. You can also brew types of tea here too. \n\nAlso unlocks Electric Stove and Electric Brewery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to begin brewing your own acholic drinks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soft Liquor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows making of Mash for soft liqours.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hard Liquor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows making of mash for harder more complex liqours.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Production III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of how to refine and make some useful stuff with power of electricity. Learn blueprints of an Electric Pressure Cooker - a stove for canning foods, and a Professional Cook Stove - for preparing meals in bulk.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Сhemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use biogen opportunities. A example is making biofuel out of corn.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biochemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build the Chemical Laboratory, which can be used to create medkits and advanced prosthetic body parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bioenergy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to refine different biomaterials into electricity. Unlocks a BioGenerator that produces electricity. Requires BioDiesel or BioMatter for a fuel source.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Food synthesizer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Minor Discovery: This allows colonists to build the food synthesizer. While not the most tasty of ways to get a meal, the paste is nutritious and it does free up colonists to do other things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soylent technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the Soylent Green Machine to make Soylent Green from Humanlike corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glassworking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Making clear glass is harder than it seems but with some hard work you will find the right formula. Glass is made by a process of heating sand to a very high temperature. Unlocks Glasswork Table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fiberglass
ResearchProjectDef.description: Glass is fragile but with the right tools you can make it stronger to expand the potential uses of it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn basics of medicine art. Have no leg or arm, or anything else? Start to use simple prosthetics from wood and steel. To make them - build a Prosthetics Workbench.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hospital I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced medicine allows you to treat some simple injuries like Frostbite or Cut. Also you can install some lif esupport to your colonists and make some hospital beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hospital II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improvements in medical art opens new cosmettic and surgical operations. You can now install some small natural body parts like noses and ears, use artificial bones and cure gut worms, asthma, scars and deep cuts. Allows colonists to build vitals monitors which increase patients treatment quality if placed next to medical beds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hospital III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improvements in medical art opens new surgical operations. You can now install some internal natural organs like heart and liver, natural body parts such as arms, legs, eyes, as well as make advanced beds specially designed to treat injured people.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hospital IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now your doctors can heal chronic diseases: Heart Artery Blockage, Muscle Parasites, Cataract, Hearing Loss, Frail and Bad Back.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brain surgery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform surgery on the brain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: After this research you may build Medical Tables that is used to craft medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Genetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Breakthrough in genetic manipulation makes it possible to construct Organ Vat, that is used to turn human corpses into biomatter and to grow natural replacement organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tailoring I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn basics of tailoring art. Unlock Tailor's Loom - a workbench equipped for tailoring basic clothing from textiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carpet Making
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to build plush carpets that will increase the quality of their environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Expert carpet making
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to build plush carpets that will increase the quality of their environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sterile materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct sterile tiles to make cleanrooms for safer and more effective medical treatment, research, and cooking.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tailoring II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improvements in tailoring art opens new Electric Tailoring Bench - a workbench with a sewing machine for rapid tailoring of clothes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tailoring III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Neuro-memetic robotics and advanced stein weaving technologies allow you to build the power armor and power armor helmets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Electronics basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate and use electricity for cooking and other simple tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Telecommunication
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to construct communications station like Comms Console and Orbital Trade Beacon, so they may interact with other colonies and trade ships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Orbital Networks
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows colonists to build Subspace Burst Transponders to contact Ships at a distance and guide them to your colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hypercomputing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Depth of telecommunication knowledge allows colonists to build a computer terminal that provides remote access to some options of the tactical computer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Improved Computer Sensors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improves the sensors of your tactical computer.\nThis will result in more detailed informations with many anomalies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Microelectronics basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks production of Integrated Circuits and construction of Mineral Sonars - which is a device that can scan deposits in mountains to identify minerals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Enhanced scanner
ResearchProjectDef.description: By doing some code refactoring in the MiSoTech* noise reduction algorithms, your researchers could improve the mobile mineral sonar efficiency. Improve the MiSoTech* to enhance the mobile mineral sonar efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanoelectronics basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research allows colonists to make Microchip Integrated Circuits, Life-Support device and Brain Stimulator.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better Synthetic internal organs prostheses and building of Synthetic Organ Assembler are now open for you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Organic optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to develop nanobots to optimize and bring out the full potential of the natural body, specifically designed to aid body purists.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bio engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Upgrade regular bionics with BioMaterial to make them even better. Opens Bionics Workbench and different small bionic prostheses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glitterworld implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to make Glitterworld implants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Biometallurgy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Breakthroughs in bionics tech and robotics allow consruction of highly advanced medical facilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stonecutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quarry
ResearchProjectDef.description: New research in mining art allows you to build quarry - a large pit for digging up long buried resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Geology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Opens the construction of a mining and drilling rigs and ground penetraing scanner.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Petrochemistry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables construction of the Petrochemical Plant. This building can refine Crude Oil into usable raw materials, as well as process the materials into finished products such as Rubber and Plastic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neutroamine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce Neutroamine from stored chemfuel, used for making medicine

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthread
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce synthread from stored chemfuel

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hyperweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the secrets of making Hyperweave

ResearchProjectDef.label: Geophysics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the construction of an advanced mining station.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Drill for oil
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the possibility of oil production and oil-related structures.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Deep Wells
ResearchProjectDef.description: Drill deeper wells to access new larger oil reservoirs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: long-range mineral scanner
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct long-range mineral scanners your researchers can use to detect precious minerals across the planet. Can be tuned to find a specific mineral. Requires advanced components to construct.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start in researching of machining arts. Unlocks Electric Sawmill and Mending Workbench with production of mending kits for your apparel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Electric Machining Table that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Drill Heads can be made here. Mechanoid bodies can be disassembled here.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 3D Printing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Electric Assembling Bench - an electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms and basic hand tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Transportation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct launchable transport pods that you can use to launch people and supplies long distances across the planet's surface.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Exotic Matter
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Inorganic Matter Converter - a converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Robotics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build small robots for simple tasks such as cleaning and hauling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanotechnology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to expand your storage capabilities. Allows you to build a specialized storage. Each nano storage can hold up to ten items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: cryptosleep casket
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cybernetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create new cybernetics body parts in a Chemical Laboratory.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dermal regenerator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows construction of the Dermal Regenerator. This is a medical device that is able to scan and repair surface tissue scars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanite shielding
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using nano technology Nanites have been developed that can be implanted in colonists to heal them or protect them from damage. Unfortunately due to the limited power and size of the Nanites they must be replaced from the Colonist Upgrade Station after each use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Quantum mechanics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks Hadron Collider - an apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Antimatter
ResearchProjectDef.description: The antimatter contained separate from the normal matter by magnetic fields so that no unintended reactions take place. The energy would then be extracted in much the same way that nuclear reactors capture the expended heat and light energy from fission reactions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alien Materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced factorization the step in understanding the basics of advanced manufacturing methods, to give your colony access to the latest assembly machinery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stargate
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying the symbols on the device you have discovered and cross-referencing with stellar constellations you have found out how to activate it and travel to other locations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orbital shield generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the Shield Generator, which prevents orbital bombardment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Austronautics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to start researching more advanced shipbuilding technologies and eventually build a ship to escape the planet.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ship sensor cluster
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct long-range sensors for a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spaceship caskets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct ship cryptosleep caskets for transporting cryptosleeping colonists between the stars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spaceship antimatter propulsion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to construct an antimatter drive for a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spaceship antimatter reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to use an antimatter containment core to build a working antimatter reactor to power a ship.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spaceship computer core
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows coercing an existing AI persona into a usable AI computer core for ship guidance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons and tools.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft powerful swords and spears.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Throwing weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft powerful bows and crossbows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metalworking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build electric smithy and Weapon Crafting Workbench.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The Weapon Crafting Workbench produces ranged weapons like pistols and rifles. Can smelt weapons down into metal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced metalworking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to construct Advanced Weapon Crafting Workbench that produces advanced ranged weapons like military assault rifles, missile launchers and heavy machine guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hightech metalworking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn now to build Mechanoid Weapon Workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Metallurgy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build electric smelters. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Casting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to prepare different metals like Aluminium, Cupronicke, Ferromanganese and Ferrosilicon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermodynamics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Metal Fabrication allows us to work with hitech alloys. Specifically using complex materials like Ferronickel, CobaltIron, Alnico and Nichrome.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nano metallurgy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Depths of metallurgy art unlocks new recipes for EAP like Titanium, Tungsten, Stellite, Ferrotitanium, Nitino and Pobedite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of putting the raw materials of this planet to good use. This technology unlocks the ability to construct robust structures using metal bars and stone blocks. Also unlocks roofs construction and Hand Concrete Mixer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in construction, unlock Electric Concrete Mixer. Also unlocks Motion Sensor Lighted Wall to light up your colonists along their merry way.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nothing says keep out like a steel reinforced door blocking your way. Continued advancement in construction unlocks the ability to secure your base with blast doors.
